title: Pyung Kim
text:
I am a Ph.D. candidate and Brain Berry J.L. Scholar at the School of Economic, Political, and Policy Sciences (EPPS) at the University of Texas at Dallas.
I research the intersection of applied econometrics and machine learning to strengthen causal inference. I also utilize GIS (Geographic Information System) to identify demands for policy intervention and provide an optimal allocation of public service. Areas of research topics include energy policy, environmental policy, and health policy aiming at tackling climate change and improving public health.
